thread.title: The Media Do Battle With a Pragmatic New President
thread.title_full: The Media Do Battle With a Pragmatic New President - WSJ

author: Jason L. Riley
title: The Media Do Battle With a Pragmatic New President
text:
During labor disputes at major newspapers, it’s not uncommon for reporters to withhold their bylines from stories to demonstrate frustration with management and win sympathy from readers. This can sometimes get management’s attention, but it’s unclear how many readers notice or care.

In recent weeks the Washington press corps’s coverage of its continuing personal feud with Donald Trump, which pits a supposedly tyrannical president...
